citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:45 AM on
February 21, 2023.
Knocked on the facility door and there was no answer. Called licensee by cell phone and the licensee stated he was
unable to conduct an inspection because he was exhibiting animals at this time. The inspector requested exhibit times
and dates to reduce the possibility of attempted inspections in the future.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:45 AM on 
February 21, 2023. 
Knocked on the facility door and there was no answer.  Called licensee by cell phone and the licensee stated he was 
unable to conduct an inspection because he was exhibiting animals at this time.  The inspector requested exhibit times 
and dates to reduce the possibility of attempted inspections in the future. 
 
 
 
End Section
